#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
void rvereseArray(int arr[], int start, int end)
{
   int temp;
   if(start >= end)
     return;
   temp = arr[start];
   arr[start] = arr[end];
   arr[end] = temp;
   rvereseArray(arr, start+1, end-1);
}

void printArray(int arr[], int size)
{
  int i,f=0;
  for(i = 0; i < size; i++)
    {
    	if(!arr[i] && !f)
    	f=0;
    	else f=1;
    	if(f)
    	cout<<arr[i];
    }
    cout<<endl;
};
int gcd(int a,int b);

void leftRotate(int arr[], int d, int n)
{
  int i, j, k, temp;
  for (i = 0; i < gcd(d, n); i++)
  {
    temp = arr[i];
    j = i;
    while(1)
    {
      k = j + d;
      if (k >= n)
        k = k - n;
      if (k == i)
        break;
      arr[j] = arr[k];
      j = k;
    }
    if(j!=0)
    arr[j] = temp;
    else arr[j] = 0;
  }
}

int gcd(int a,int b)
{
   if(b==0)
     return a;
   else
     return gcd(b, a%b);
}


void addlargenum(string num1, string num2){
int min = (num1.length() < num2.length()? num1.length():num2.length());
int max = (num1.length() < num2.length()? num2.length():num1.length());
string sign1="+" , sign2="+";
int i=0,j1=0,check=0;
if(num1[0]==45)
{sign1="-";
--max;
j1=1;
}
else j1=0;
int n1[max];


for ( i=0;i< max;i++ ){
if(num1.length() > num2.length())
n1[i]= num1[i+j1]-48;
else
n1[i]= num1[i+j1]-48;
}
if(num2[0]==45)
{sign2="-";
--min;
j1=1;}
else j1=0;
int n2[min];
for (i=0 ;i< min;i++ ){
if(num1.length() < num2.length())
n2[i]= num2[i+j1]-48;
else
n2[i]= num2[i+j1]-48;
}
rvereseArray(n1, 0, max-1);
int carry = 0;
int sum[max+min+1];
int k=0,j=0,max2=0;
for(k=0;k<max+min;k++)
sum[k]=0;
max2=min-1;
for(j=0;j<min;j++)
{

	for ( k=0;k<max;k++)
	{
		sum[max+min-k-1] = sum[max+min-k-1] + n1[k]*n2[j] ;
	}

		carry=0;
		if(max2>0)
	 {leftRotate(sum, 1, max+min);
	 --max2;
	 }
}
		check=max+min-1;
		carry=0;
		while(sum[check] >= 10 || check!=0)
		{carry=sum[check]/10;
		sum[check]=sum[check]%10;
		sum[check-1]=sum[check-1]+carry;
		check--;
		}
string result;
if(sign1>sign2)
{
	cout<<sign1;
}
else if(sign1<sign2)
{
	cout<<sign2;
}
printArray(sum, max+min);
}
int main()
{
	string s1,s2;
	int test=0;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		cin>>s1;
		cin>>s2;
		if(s1.length()<s2.length())
		s1.swap (s2);
		addlargenum(s1,s2);
		s1.clear();
		s2.clear();
	}
	return 0;
}
